description: This file provides utility functions related to device identification and authentication status, including generating and storing a UUID in localStorage, and exposing functions for external modules to retrieve device and subject IDs as well as authentication status.

methods.name: uuidv4()
methods.description: Generates a RFC4122-like UUID v4 using crypto.getRandomValues when available, or Math.random as fallback.

methods.name: getDeviceId()
methods.description: Returns a persistent device ID stored in localStorage under 'calc.deviceId'; generates and stores a new UUID if none exists, with fallback to a non-persistent UUID if localStorage is unavailable.

methods.name: getSubjectId()
methods.description: Returns the device ID used for audit attribution, essentially an alias for getDeviceId.

methods.name: isAuthenticated()
methods.description: Returns true for compatibility, indicating the user is always considered authenticated in anonymous mode.

methods.name: useAuth()
methods.description: Provides an anonymous authentication context with null user, 'anonymous' role, and authentication status true.
